name: Worm
setup: Segmented worm-like body with joints between head and body segments.
goal: Move the worm in the desired direction at the desired speed.

agents.description: Ten worm agents moving independently with shared behavior parameters.

terms: Reward increases when body velocity matches the target velocity.
Reward increases when heading aligns with the goal direction.
Rewards are combined so that both speed and alignment matter.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: Moderate-size vector of joint positions, rotations, and velocities.
